## SSX.resolveEns() method

ENS data supported by SSX.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resolveEns(
    address: string, resolveEnsOpts?: SSXEnsResolveOptions): Promise<SSXEnsData>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | User address. |
|  resolveEnsOpts | [SSXEnsResolveOptions](./ssx.ssxensresolveoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Options to resolve ENS. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SSXEnsData](./ssx.ssxensdata.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Object containing ENS data.
